attributes.action: Stop the sale of fireworks to public
attributes.additional_details: Fireworks night is probably one of the worst for animals. Not only are they petrified of the extremely loud bangs but it causes unnecessary stress to them. Ban the sale of fireworks to the public and all shops and make people attend private displays!
attributes.background: Ban fireworks from being sold in all shops

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/319891
